## BezierCurve.Interpolate() method

Returns the cubic Bezier interpolated value (float) at "t" (float) from the given x1, y1, x2, y2 floats

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Interpolate(t: number, x1: number, y1: number, x2: number, y2: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  t | <code>number</code> | defines the time |
|  x1 | <code>number</code> | defines the left coordinate on X axis |
|  y1 | <code>number</code> | defines the left coordinate on Y axis |
|  x2 | <code>number</code> | defines the right coordinate on X axis |
|  y2 | <code>number</code> | defines the right coordinate on Y axis |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the interpolated value
